title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Desk and Drawers Unit with Chair", 1934–35
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
description: Drawing for desk and drawers unit with chair for Lady Esther Yacht. Doorway at left, four-drawer unit at right with rounded edges on left corner. Drawer unit becomes desk on right wall. Left side of desk is cabinet below, one drawer above. Long rectangular drawer at center with space for chair below. Five drawers at right. Drawer pulls on desk and drawer unit are thin and rectangular. Two small rectangular windows above desk. Pedestal chair in front of desk with circular, upholstered seat. Low chairback also acts as arms and connects to seat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Desk and Drawers Unit with Chair", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-309.
